title: Real News 0
text: The president announced new economic policies during today's press conference. The new measures are expected to boost employment rates.
subject: politics

title: Real News 1
text: Scientists at MIT have developed a new technology that could revolutionize renewable energy production. The research was published in Nature journal.
subject: science

title: Real News 2
text: The stock market closed higher today after positive earnings reports from major tech companies. Investors showed confidence in the market.
subject: business

title: Real News 3
text: Local authorities have announced plans to improve public transportation in the city. The project will begin next month.
subject: local

title: Real News 4
text: A new study shows that regular exercise can significantly improve mental health. The research involved 1000 participants over two years.
subject: health
